《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

而家中共重施故技，不停催谷人數上街，逼美國喺一個未成熟嘅時期 show hand，破壞美國對中共嘅部署。而家美國醞釀嘅就係全世界向中共索償武漢病毒嘅賠償。而家澳洲、加拿大、歐盟同埋全世界～［一百四十多個］～國家已經準備同共匪攞錢，今次配到佢仆街冚家剷都唔得。

過去一個禮拜咩都出晒。考評局、劉小禮、國安法、Facebook 同 Google 打壓香港人嘅專頁同搜尋字眼（你哋唔係唔記得 Facebook 同 Google 幾咁瀨共㗎），呢啲就係想激你哋上街，令到美國又要預先處理香港嘅嘢變相暫時「放生」佢武漢病毒嘅索償。點解會放生佢？因為呢啲嘢要一次過大核彈認識先至可以一次過整死共匪。如果預先用香港逼佢妥協嘅美國好難再向佢索償武漢病毒嘅損失。呢一道氣唔可以洩，洩咗嘅就中共一定死唔去。

若然中國要玩國安法嘅就證明兩樣嘢。一，就係佢已經諗過同你哋動武。上次十幾萬武警可以出得佢今次一定有過之而無不及。二，就係佢睇死香港人唔願意真正「攬炒」，只係紙老虎。佢要攬炒就同佢攬，由得出國安法，安心等香港食屎。之前民間記者會已經講過，如果出解放軍，就返屋企瞓覺。唔好唔記得呢樣嘢。而家你就當佢出硬解放軍，乜。都。唔。好。做。

呢啲唔係叫做散水撚分化撚或者覺得勇武冇用如此類推。你盟主我永遠唔會同前線割蓆或者覺得佢哋冇用，但係你哋出去係唔會令到件事有另類發展。當你扭轉唔到局面嘅時候，就不如留下有用之軀等待他日美國一出手就齊齊攞佢命。

自己香港當然要自己救，但係都要食腦。君子報仇，十年未晚。雖然我哋覺得香港好似冇乜時間剩低，但係中共更加冇時間。各國經濟開始恢復嘅時侯就會同共產黨攞錢，而美國而家已經開得七七八八。共匪就係知道佢時日無多所以就搵香港人做人質，逼美國即時出手拯救香港變相令到佢洩氣。

各位香港人，千祈唔好驚。唔係世界末日。我知道而家覺得好似世界末日咁，但係你哋一定要鎮定。美國一定會出手，而且係好快出手，唔好畀小事阻礙大計。

最後，贈四隻字畀你哋：處變不驚。

Principles for a Temporary Constitution of Hong Kong

1. 香港領土非經全埠公民投票之決議，不得增減或轉移之

2. 惟香港公民有各局投票權、參選權、選舉權及推舉權(被選舉權)

3. 行政長官一職，改為總督，作為象徵元首保留之，另設內閣總理一職，以行使憲法賦予之實權

4. 總督、內閣總理之權，以憲法所規定者為限，最終解釋權在於香港終審法院

5. 原立法會之直選議席與功能組別議席重組，原功能組別改組為諮議局，直選議席改組為立法局，香港議會由諮議局及立法局兩局組成，即本埠之上、下議院，此架構未經議會許可，不可更動之

6. 立法局議員由公民公選之，諮議局議員由公民於有法定特別資格者公選之。

7. 憲法改正提案權屬於香港議會(即本埠之上、下議院)

8. 香港議會必須遵循憲法所規，不得施行苛法。

9. 市政事務由市政局及下設區議會施行， 市政局及下設區議會所有議員皆由公民公選之。

10. 內閣總理由立法局最大黨黨魁擔任，內閣官員由內閣總理推舉，內閣成員必須為立法局議員，總督任命。

11. 內閣總理及內閣官員不可同時擔任諮議局議員

12. 香港警察接議會要求重組後，負責香港防務及保安，其內部運作將由內閣警務部長監督

13. 有關香港之國際條約，非經香港議會議決，不得締結

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

英文呀

<May 21st Hong Kong Independence Declaration>


Preface

The Hong Kong Anti-extradition movement is approaching its first anniversary. Hong-kongers’ goal has revolved from stopping the extradition bill to advocating the five demands. However the SAR Government has not just refused to listen to the people’s clear demands, but resolved to using the police as a tool to unrightfully arrest and murder protestors. Hong Kong’s core values like the rule of law, freedom of speech, the right to assembly and rally, have been corroded drastically since last year. “One country, two systems, Hong Kong people rule hong kong” have all become non-existent slogans. The honeymoon has long been over, and “one country, one system” is the dreaded reality that over a million Hong Kongers are awakening to.


Foreword

The Hong Kong SAR Government has become the meaningless puppet of the CCP, and continues to raise bills like the National Anthem Bill to throttle freedom of speech in Hong Kong. The threat of establishing the Article 23 of the Basic Law has always been imminent. When the police, the courts and even the legislature has become mere chess pieces of the CCP, the hong kong people have awaken to the truth that struggles within the establishment is useless and only when we embrace the idea of an independent Hong Kong state, can we possibly build a government that truly belongs to the people. Although we once thought Hong Kong as an independent state was only a distant dream, throughout the pass year we have heard countless voices on the streets starting to demand “Independence is the only way for Hong Kong”. We believe that in the ever approaching threat of the CCP, a growing number of Hong Kongers will awaken and join our league to fight for and build an independent Hong Kong state.


Aims


Henceforth, we will now propose achievable short term and medium term goals to attain independence for Hong Kong. May we continue to march forward with a clear goal and
Steadfast determination.


We propose in the short term to:


i）Further develop labour unions in every trade, and increase the penetration rates in each
industry

ii）through developing trade unions, establish development plans for each industry

iii）Establish an independent survey body to clarify Hong Kongers’ views on how to achieve
independence

iv）Develop local enterprises and aim to achieve self-sufficiency in Hong Kong’s Economy

v）Increase liaison between Frontliner teams





Medium term goals:

Establish a People’s Parliament through election

II) Establish an overseas provisional government fund

III) Establish an Hong Kong Independence Army, funded by the provisional government fund



Long term goals:

I) Write and enact a Hong Kong Constitution

II）Establish a provisional government and elect a Cabinet and President



Conclusion

Throughout the pass year fellow protestors faced much opposition and fellow Hong Kongers and global community have awakened to the threat that the CCP is to the global community. Hong Kongers will use this declaration to mark the start of a new page, and keep finding new ways to fight for freedom, and seek Hong Kong independence. May Hong Kong rise again from the ashes and be reborn gloriously as an independent Hong Kong state. Glory to Hong Kong.

Principles for a Temporary Constitution of Hong Kong

1. Hong Kong territories could not be changed without Referendum of Hong Kong citizens.

2. Hong Kong Citizens enjoy the equal right to vote and to stand for election without unreasonable restrictions.

3. Chief Executive will be replaced by Governor and retained as Cerenomial Head of State. The administrative power will be exercised by Chief Minister subject to constitution.

4. The power of Governor and Chief Minister are all subject to constitution. Counrt of Final Appeal uphold the ultimate right of interpretation.

5. Hong Kong original legislature will be reformed. Direct constituency will be reformed as House of Representatives while functional constituency will be reformed as Senate. The Hong Kong Parliament is conmopsed of House of Representatives and Senate. They will be regarded as Lower and Upper House respectively. This constituency could not be changed without consent of Parliament.

6. House of Representatives will be formed by election by Hong Kong citizens. Senate will be formed by Hong Kong citizens holding specific qualifications.

7. The right to amendment of constitution belongs to Hong Kong Parliament (i.e. Senate and House of Representatives of Hong Kong)

8. Hong Kong Paliament must follow this constitution and must not adopt tyranny.

9. Local affairs will be handled by Urban Council and District Council. Both Councils are formed by election by Hong Kong citizens.

10. Holder of confidence of House of Representatives will be appointed as Chief minister. Cabinet members will be nominated by chief minister and appointed by Governor. The cabinet members must be members of House of Representatives.

11. Chief minister and cabinent members could not be member of Senate.

12. Hong Kong Police will be responsible for Hong Kong defence and security issues after the reform instructed by parliament. Its operation will be supervised by Ministry of Police of the Cabinet.

13. Without consent of parliament, Hong Kong government could not go into any international agreements or treaties.

3. Chief Executive will be replaced by Governor and retained as Cerenomial Head of State. The administrative power will be exercised by Chief Minister subject to constitution.

4. The power of Governor and Chief Minister are all subject to constitution. Court of Final Appeal uphold the ultimate right of interpretation.

5. Hong Kong original legislature will be reformed. Direct constituency will be reformed as House of Representatives while functional constituency will be reformed as Senate. The Hong Kong Parliament is comopsed of House of Representatives and Senate. They will be regarded as Lower and Upper House respectively. This constituency could not be changed without consent of Parliament.

6. House of Representatives will be formed by election by Hong Kong citizens. Senate will be formed by Hong Kong citizens holding specific qualifications.

7. The right to amendment of constitution belongs to Hong Kong Parliament (i.e. Senate and House of Representatives of Hong Kong)

8. Hong Kong Paliament must follow this constitution and must not adopt tyranny.

9. Local affairs will be handled by Urban Council and District Council. Both Councils are formed by election by Hong Kong citizens.

10. Holder of confidence of House of Representatives will be appointed as Chief minister. Cabinet members will be nominated by chief minister and appointed by Governor. The cabinet members must be members of House of Representatives.

11. Chief minister and cabinent members could not be member of Senate.

12. Hong Kong Police will be responsible for Hong Kong defence and security issues after the reform instructed by parliament. Its operation will be supervised by Ministry of Police of the Cabinet.

13. Without consent of parliament, Hong Kong government could not go into any international agreements or treaties.

英文呀

<May 21st Hong Kong Independence Declaration>


Preface

The Hong Kong Anti-extradition movement is approaching its first anniversary. Hong-kongers’ goal has revolved from stopping the extradition bill to advocating the five demands. However the SAR Government has not just refused to listen to the people’s clear demands, but resolved to using the police as a tool to unrightfully arrest and murder protestors. Hong Kong’s core values like the rule of law, freedom of speech, the right to assembly and rally, have been corroded drastically since last year. “One country, two systems, Hong Kong people rule hong kong” have all become non-existent slogans. The honeymoon has long been over, and “one country, one system” is the dreaded reality that over a million Hong Kongers are awakening to.


Foreword

The Hong Kong SAR Government has become the meaningless puppet of the CCP, and continues to raise bills like the National Anthem Bill to throttle freedom of speech in Hong Kong. The threat of establishing the Article 23 of the Basic Law has always been imminent. When the police, the courts and even the legislature has become mere chess pieces of the CCP, the hong kong people have awaken to the truth that struggles within the establishment is useless and only when we embrace the idea of an independent Hong Kong state, can we possibly build a government that truly belongs to the people. Although we once thought Hong Kong as an independent state was only a distant dream, throughout the pass year we have heard countless voices on the streets starting to demand “Independence is the only way for Hong Kong”. We believe that in the ever approaching threat of the CCP, a growing number of Hong Kongers will awaken and join our league to fight for and build an independent Hong Kong state.


Aims


Henceforth, we will now propose achievable short term and medium term goals to attain independence for Hong Kong. May we continue to march forward with a clear goal and
Steadfast determination.


We propose in the short term to:


i）Further develop labour unions in every trade, and increase the penetration rates in each
industry

ii）through developing trade unions, establish development plans for each industry

iii）Establish an independent survey body to clarify Hong Kongers’ views on how to achieve
independence

iv）Develop local enterprises and aim to achieve self-sufficiency in Hong Kong’s Economy

v）Increase liaison between Frontliner teams





Medium term goals:

Establish a People’s Parliament through election

II) Establish an overseas provisional government fund

III) Establish an Hong Kong Independence Army, funded by the provisional government fund



Long term goals:

I) Write and enact a Hong Kong Constitution

II）Establish a provisional government and elect a Cabinet and President



Conclusion

Throughout the pass year fellow protestors faced much opposition and fellow Hong Kongers and global community have awakened to the threat that the CCP is to the global community. Hong Kongers will use this declaration to mark the start of a new page, and keep finding new ways to fight for freedom, and seek Hong Kong independence. May Hong Kong rise again from the ashes and be reborn gloriously as an independent Hong Kong state. Glory to Hong Kong.

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

<May 21st Hong Kong Independence Declaration>


Preface

The Hong Kong Anti-extradition movement is approaching its first anniversary. Hong-kongers’ goal has revolved from stopping the extradition bill to advocating the five demands. However the SAR Government has not just refused to listen to the people’s clear demands, but resolved to using the police as a tool to unrightfully arrest and murder protestors. Hong Kong’s core values like the rule of law, freedom of speech, the right to assembly and rally, have been corroded drastically since last year. “One country, two systems, Hong Kong people rule hong kong” have all become non-existent slogans. The honeymoon has long been over, and “one country, one system” is the dreaded reality that over a million Hong Kongers are awakening to.


Foreword

The Hong Kong SAR Government has become the meaningless puppet of the CCP, and continues to raise bills like the National Anthem Bill to throttle freedom of speech in Hong Kong. The threat of establishing the Article 23 of the Basic Law has always been imminent. When the police, the courts and even the legislature has become mere chess pieces of the CCP, the hong kong people have awaken to the truth that struggles within the establishment is useless and only when we embrace the idea of an independent Hong Kong state, can we possibly build a government that truly belongs to the people. Although we once thought Hong Kong as an independent state was only a distant dream, throughout the pass year we have heard countless voices on the streets starting to demand “Independence is the only way for Hong Kong”. We believe that in the ever approaching threat of the CCP, a growing number of Hong Kongers will awaken and join our league to fight for and build an independent Hong Kong state.


Aims


Henceforth, we will now propose achievable short term and medium term goals to attain independence for Hong Kong. May we continue to march forward with a clear goal and
Steadfast determination.


We propose in the short term to:


i）Further develop labour unions in every trade, and increase the penetration rates in each
industry

ii）through developing trade unions, establish development plans for each industry

iii）Establish an independent survey body to clarify Hong Kongers’ views on how to achieve
independence

iv）Develop local enterprises and aim to achieve self-sufficiency in Hong Kong’s Economy

v）Increase liaison between Frontliner teams





Medium term goals:

Establish a People’s Parliament through election

II) Establish an overseas provisional government fund

III) Establish an Hong Kong Independence Army, funded by the provisional government fund



Long term goals:

I) Write and enact a Hong Kong Constitution

II）Establish a provisional government and elect a Cabinet and President



Conclusion

Throughout the pass year fellow protestors faced much opposition and fellow Hong Kongers and global community have awakened to the threat that the CCP is to the global community. Hong Kongers will use this declaration to mark the start of a new page, and keep finding new ways to fight for freedom, and seek Hong Kong independence. May Hong Kong rise again from the ashes and be reborn gloriously as an independent Hong Kong state. Glory to Hong Kong.

When the police, the courts and even the legislature has become mere chess pieces of the CCP, the hong kong people have awaken to the truth that struggles within the establishment is useless and only when we embrace the idea of an independent Hong Kong state, can we possibly build a government that truly belongs to the people. Although we once thought Hong Kong as an independent state was only a distant dream, throughout the pass year we have heard countless voices on the streets starting to demand “Independence is the only way for Hong Kong”. We believe that in the ever approaching threat of the CCP, a growing number of Hong Kongers will awaken and join our league to fight for and build an independent Hong Kong state.


Aims


Henceforth, we will now propose achievable short term and medium term goals to attain independence for Hong Kong. May we continue to march forward with a clear goal and
Steadfast determination.


We propose in the short term to:


i）Further develop labour unions in every trade, and increase the penetration rates in each
industry

ii）through developing trade unions, establish development plans for each industry

iii）Establish an independent survey body to clarify Hong Kongers’ views on how to achieve
independence

iv）Develop local enterprises and aim to achieve self-sufficiency in Hong Kong’s Economy

v）Increase liaison between Frontliner teams





Medium term goals:

Establish a People’s Parliament through election

II) Establish an overseas provisional government fund

III) Establish an Hong Kong Independence Army, funded by the provisional government fund



Long term goals:

I) Write and enact a Hong Kong Constitution

II）Establish a provisional government and elect a Cabinet and President



Conclusion

Throughout the pass year fellow protestors faced much opposition and fellow Hong Kongers and global community have awakened to the threat that the CCP is to the global community. Hong Kongers will use this declaration to mark the start of a new page, and keep finding new ways to fight for freedom, and seek Hong Kong independence. May Hong Kong rise again from the ashes and be reborn gloriously as an independent Hong Kong state. Glory to Hong Kong.

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

《五二一香港獨立宣言》

序文：

反修例抗爭已經持續將近一年，香港人由當初要求撤回送中條例，演變成爭取五大訴求，但特區政府不但開始警暴，更濫捕濫殺抗爭者。香港的核心價值，如法治，言論自由，集會遊行自由等日復日被港府蠶食。“一國兩制，高度自治，港人治港”名存實亡，香港回歸後的蜜月期正式宣告結束，“一國一制”步步進逼，各種猙獰的醜態喚醒了過百萬港人。

前言：

甘心當中國共產黨傀儡的港府，在近來強推《國歌條例草案》，基本法23條的威脅一直離我們不遠。當法庭和立法會甚至執法部門都淪為政府的棋子，人民逐漸醒覺，在制度裡的角力根本徒勞無功，只有擁抱香港獨立的理念，才有可能建立真正為民所有，為民所治，為民所享的政府。雖然我們曾經把香港獨立當為天方夜譚，但當走上街頭的聲音紛紛喊出“香港獨立 唯一出路”的口號，我們深信在共產黨的步步進逼之下，更多的港人將會加入我們的行列，一同建構獨立的香港。

目標：

有見及此，我們現就香港獨立此宏大目標，訂下充分可以實行的短期和中期目標。願在無大台的時代革命裡，我們仍方向清晰，堅定不移向香港獨立的目標出發。

我們倡議在短期內：

i）將各行各業的工會體制成熟化，將其覆蓋率和滲透率提升
ii）透過各工會組織，訂下各行業本土化的發展藍圖
iii）成立香港獨立全民普查機構，釐清香港人對於獨立的願景
iv）拓展本土企業圈，促進經濟自給自足
v）勇武組織化，小隊之間加強聯絡和協調

中期內：
i）透過同路人之間的選舉，成立全民議會
ii）建立香港獨立軍，由臨時政府基金資助
iii）建立海外臨時政府基金，由議會協調運用方式

長期目標：
i）訂立臨時憲法
ii）選出內閣和總統
iii）成立香港臨時政府


總結：

過往一年我等在各方盡受打壓，世界和港人已經看清楚共產黨的禍害，願香港在獨立路上能為世界各地正在追求自由民主的人們互相打氣。一眾香港人以此明志，破舊立新，會一直革新我們抗爭的方式，去追求香港獨立的終極目標。願香港此城從灰燼重生為更耀眼的香港國，榮光終歸香港。

英文呀

<May 21st Hong Kong Independence Declaration>


Preface

The Hong Kong Anti-extradition movement is approaching its first anniversary. Hong-kongers’ goal has revolved from stopping the extradition bill to advocating the five demands. However the SAR Government has not just refused to listen to the people’s clear demands, but resolved to using the police as a tool to unrightfully arrest and murder protestors. Hong Kong’s core values like the rule of law, freedom of speech, the right to assembly and rally, have been corroded drastically since last year. “One country, two systems, Hong Kong people rule hong kong” have all become non-existent slogans. The honeymoon has long been over, and “one country, one system” is the dreaded reality that over a million Hong Kongers are awakening to.


Foreword

The Hong Kong SAR Government has become the meaningless puppet of the CCP, and continues to raise bills like the National Anthem Bill to throttle freedom of speech in Hong Kong. The threat of establishing the Article 23 of the Basic Law has always been imminent. When the police, the courts and even the legislature has become mere chess pieces of the CCP, the hong kong people have awaken to the truth that struggles within the establishment is useless and only when we embrace the idea of an independent Hong Kong state, can we possibly build a government that truly belongs to the people. Although we once thought Hong Kong as an independent state was only a distant dream, throughout the pass year we have heard countless voices on the streets starting to demand “Independence is the only way for Hong Kong”. We believe that in the ever approaching threat of the CCP, a growing number of Hong Kongers will awaken and join our league to fight for and build an independent Hong Kong state.


Aims


Henceforth, we will now propose achievable short term and medium term goals to attain independence for Hong Kong. May we continue to march forward with a clear goal and
Steadfast determination.


We propose in the short term to:


i）Further develop labour unions in every trade, and increase the penetration rates in each
industry

ii）through developing trade unions, establish development plans for each industry

iii）Establish an independent survey body to clarify Hong Kongers’ views on how to achieve
independence

iv）Develop local enterprises and aim to achieve self-sufficiency in Hong Kong’s Economy

v）Increase liaison between Frontliner teams





Medium term goals:

Establish a People’s Parliament through election

II) Establish an overseas provisional government fund

III) Establish an Hong Kong Independence Army, funded by the provisional government fund



Long term goals:

I) Write and enact a Hong Kong Constitution

II）Establish a provisional government and elect a Cabinet and President



Conclusion

Throughout the pass year fellow protestors faced much opposition and fellow Hong Kongers and global community have awakened to the threat that the CCP is to the global community. Hong Kongers will use this declaration to mark the start of a new page, and keep finding new ways to fight for freedom, and seek Hong Kong independence. May Hong Kong rise again from the ashes and be reborn gloriously as an independent Hong Kong state. Glory to Hong Kong.
